oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Academic education on organic food and farming in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Taskinen, Aija
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The University of Helsinki offers basic and intermediate studies in organic food and farming in Ruralia Institute in Mikkeli. The study programme for organic food and farming is known as the Eco Studies.
